author: Reuters Editorial
title: Britain's May says will uphold environmental standards after
text:
LONDON (Reuters) - said on Friday Britain would seek to uphold environmental standards after Brexit and manage its fishing stocks in a sustainable way.
Britain's makes a speech about her vision for Brexit at Mansion House in London, Britain, March 2, 2018. REUTERS/Peter Nicholls While May acknowledged that maintaining relevant standards and customs arrangements would constrain the countryâ€™s ability to lower standards, she said in practice Britain would not want to do that anyway.
Reporting by Alastair Smout and Andrew MacAskill; writing by Kate Holton; editing by Stephen Addison
